org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.deploy
Interface IAePolicyMapper

All Known Implementing Classes:
AeAxisPolicyMapper, AeMasterPolicyMapper
public interface IAePolicyMapper

Handle the platform specific details of deploying policy for a web service.

Method Summary
 java.util.Map getCallProperties(java.util.List aPolicyList)
          Maps client policy assertions to property name/value pairs.

          Maps sender side policy assertions to handler chain definitions.

          Maps receiver side policy assertions to wsdd deployment document.

 java.util.List getServiceParameters(java.util.List aPolicyList)
          Maps policy assertions to service parameter definitions.

getServiceParameters

public java.util.List getServiceParameters(java.util.List aPolicyList)
                                    throws AeException
Maps policy assertions to service parameter definitions.

Parameters:
aPolicyList - A list of policies to be mapped to the service
Returns:
List of parameter definitions
Throws:
AeException

getDeploymentHandler

public java.lang.String getDeploymentHandler(java.util.List aPolicyList)
                                      throws AeException
Determines the appropriate deployment handler key from policy assertions. If no specific deployment handler is determined from policies, implementations should return null.

Parameters:
aPolicyList -
Returns:
deployment handler key
Throws:
AeException
